title: Trying to create a ›is-featured-in-racing-game‹ relationship with invalid CAR MODEL VARIANT ID
gherkin:
Given "CAR MODEL VARIANT" "Aston Martin DB7" does NOT exist
And there exists a "RACING GAME" "Gran Turismo"
When the user creates a "is featured in racing game" relationship between "Aston Martin DB7" and "Gran Turismo"
Then the request should be rejected with status code 404
